      • checkCredentials

        com.wedriveu.shared.rabbitmq.message.LoginResponse checkCredentials(com.wedriveu.shared.rabbitmq.message.LoginRequest loginRequest)
                                                             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        This method checks the credentials from user's input.
        Parameters:
        loginRequest - The request with which check the credentials.
        Returns:
        A LoginResponse as a result of this check operation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the service has not been started yet or if it has been stopped.
